00087                               class TranslationTableModel & ttm,
00088                          std::map<std::string, ExperimentResults*> & er);

00092     return ToStr("dmet3_marker.reg");

00095     return ToStr("dmet3_haplotype.reg");

00099     return std::string("RegressionExperimentReport");

00102     return REGRESSION;
